trans-unit.source: The <see cref="N:System.EnterpriseServices" /> namespace provides an important infrastructure for enterprise applications.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="N:System.EnterpriseServices" /> 命名空间为企业应用程序提供重要的基础结构。

trans-unit.source: COM+ provides a services architecture for component programming models deployed in an enterprise environment.
trans-unit.target: COM+ 为企业级环境中部署的组件编程模型提供服务结构。

trans-unit.source: This namespace provides .NET objects with access to COM+ services making the .NET Framework objects more practical for enterprise applications.
trans-unit.target: 此命名空间为 .NET 对象提供了对 COM+ 服务的访问，从而使 .NET Framework 对象更适用于企业级应用程序。

trans-unit.source: For information about using <xref:System.EnterpriseServices>, see [Writing Serviced Components](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f109ee24-81ad-4d99-9892-51ac6f34978c)
trans-unit.target: 有关使用信息<xref:System.EnterpriseServices>，请参阅[编写提供服务组件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f109ee24-81ad-4d99-9892-51ac6f34978c)
